name: Winter's Fruit
description:
"The fire is winter's fruit."

The biggest winter storm of the season is fast approaching, and you get a knock on your door. It's your once-and-former friend, the one you haven't spoken to in months.

And she's come bearing a... shoe?

Do you let her in or do you slam the door in her pretty face, and let her die in the snow, probably?

Your call, babe.

❄️

WHAT'S THIS, EH?

A short, retro-styled Text ADV made in two weeks for Winter VN Jam 2022

A little sweet, a little spicy (but quite SFW don't worry).

V. queer.

Not intended for bigots ✌

❄️

CONTENT WARNINGS

Adults using adult language (there's an f-bomb or two).
Implied sexuality.

❄️

FEATURES
  • 1 gay disaster
  • 1 dream girl
  • 1 winter storm that won't quit
  • 1 elephant in the room
  • Too many ellipses to count, really

❄️

GAMEPLAY
  • Use SPACE or ENTER to move things along.
  • Toggle AUTO mode on/off by pressing the A button.
  • Use MOUSE to make choices. (Most) choices are optional, and won't stop the story from continuing.
  • Sounds better with headphones imo

❄️
